query.sql: SELECT date_format(e.event_date, '%Y%m%d') AS event_date, e.content AS content, e.name AS NAME, e.type AS type, e.code AS code, e.id AS id, e.stock_code AS stock_code FROM stock_event e WHERE e.event_date > date_sub(curdate(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND e.stock_code = [ stock_code ]
update stock_event set content=[content] where id=[id]
